name: Bunch Text Changer
description:
Change all visible unlocked text layers in selection to a new value in one go with this plugin


1. Select one or several text layers

2. Call the plugin

3. Paste or type a new value

4. Hit enter. Done!


• Plugin will change ALL nested text layers in selected groups, Components, Instances or Frames


• If all selected layers already have the same value, it will appear in the placeholder (handy for correcting typos)


• Input is preselected, so you can call the plugin and type right away


• Block some layers from changing by staring the layer name with minus sign


See demo and some details on working with plugins faster here: https://twitter.com/aswellasyouare/status/1161070905142984704
